summary: Adds the zabrak race form Star Wars to the world of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/37018666.png[/img]

[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/6b41d6b1.png[/img]


First of all, sorry my english, I’m spanish.

Hi, I’m ZunaSW and this is my first race mod.
This mod creates a new race, the zabrak race from Star Wars.
The mod adds:

-	New different hair (horns)
-	New warpaints
-	New skin colors


Zabraks: The zabraks born in Iridonia, they are warriors, independents and carnivorous.
Darth Maul, Savage Opress and Eeth Koth are examples of zabrak.

With this mod, you can be a male zabrak or a female zabrak.

Skill Bonus:

Two-handed +10
Light armor +5
Heavy armor +5
Sneak +5
Destruction +5
Block +5

I will make new races like Twi’lek, Sith, Devaronian, etc.
This mod is available in English and Spanish.


Video:

[youtube]Oujj5jiumu4[/youtube]

[youtube]IEBN8c7da3A[/youtube]



Version 1.0

Fixed horns.
Zabrak Fort. (around kynesgrove)
Four Zabraks in the Zabrak Fort.
Darth Maul and Savage Opress are followers, they are in the fort.
New hairs (now are 18 hairs)
New warpaints
Fixed the correct place in the female warpaints.
Skin colors of Maul and Savage are fixed.
The bug of the invisible head is fixed.

Version 0.8

Followers Darth Maul and Savage Opress in the exterior of Palace of the Kings.
Fixed horns.
Fixes warpaints.
Savage Opress and Darth Maul now have the correct warpaint and skin color.


Version 0.7

Now the horns are better, there are the correctly hairs. Remove the nord hairs for zabrak race.

If you don\'t see the horns in the selection of hair, change sex and change sex again, you will see the horns if you make it.



Version 0.6

With fixed horns. I used the smooth modifier to fix the horns. Now the horns are better.
Darth Maul and Savage Opress are in Palace of the Kings exterior, they will follow you if you want.
Mod prepared to create the Twi\'lek race.



[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/86a1dee7.png[/img]

Put the files you find in the archive into skyrim data folder. (\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)


[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/5f690acd.png[/img]


Delete the archives:

StarWarsRaces.esp (data folder)
textures\\horns (folder)
meshes\\horns (folder)


[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/1e9e682e.png[/img]


-	Me, I made the horns meshes and textures, the warpaints and skin colors.
-	Bethesda, for create Skyrim
-	Star Wars and The Clone Wars creators, for inspired me to make the zabrak race and the creation of some warpaints.
-       lordslayer0, he made the spanish traduction of the 1.0 version.


Special Thanks:

-	Star Wars and The Clone Wars creators, for create the Star Wars films and The Clone Wars series television and for the fantastic world of Star Wars
-	Bethesda, create Skyrim, the best videogame.
-	And four person who encouraged me. Thanks guys :)


Permissions:
If you want to use this race, just send a pm me, contact me on Twitter or Youtube, and I will give you permission.


[img]http://box.jisko.net/i/387396ee.jpg[/img]
